glsa.title: Open Asset Import Library ("assimp"): Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Open Asset Import Library, the worst of which could result in denial of service.

background.p: Open Asset Import Library is a library to import and export various 3d-model-formats including scene-post-processing to generate missing render data.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Fetchmail, the worst of which could result in email disclosure to third parties.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
